job.title: Associate Software Engineer for RHEL Migrations - Remote
job.description: The Red Hat Engineering team is looking for a Software Engineer with practical experience in operating system migrations to join our team. In this role, you will help with creating migration tools for moving systems from one version of Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL) to the next. You will also design solutions for migrating other operating systems to Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL). As a Software Engineer, you will work with innovative technology and will help improve the user experience for Linux admins. You will work as part of an international team. This role will allow you to learn more about the inner workings of Linux and to improve your Python language skills. You will work on the upstream projects in GitHub and your contributions will be visible to anyone including the community and customers. Successful applicants must reside in a country where Red Hat is registered to do business. Red Hat helps customers integrate new and existing IT applications, develop cloud-native applications, standardize on our industry-leading operating system, and automate, secure, and manage complex environments. Award-winning support, training, and consulting services make Red Hat a trusted adviser to the Fortune 500. As a strategic partner to cloud providers, system integrators, application vendors, customers, and open source communities, Red Hat can help organizations prepare for the digital future.
